data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Ntcheu prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ntcheu, Malawi
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Ntcheu, Malawi to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 5 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 3,623 believers in Ntcheu.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Jesus, make the 12,497 people in the state of Ntcheu who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Swahili people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
God, we pray for the believers in Ntcheu, Malawi to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Ntcheu
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who are far from you in Ntcheu. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.
